sentences.sContent: Without sustenance, the animals will soon die.
sentences.sCn: 没有食物，动物很快就会死亡。

sentences.sContent: Potatoes were their only means of sustenance.
sentences.sCn: 马铃薯是他们唯一的食物。

remMethod.val: sus(在…下面) + ten(支撑) + ance → 在下面支撑 → 维持

words.tran: 支持者，维持者；主发动机；支撑的人物

trans.tranOther: food that people or animals need in order to live
